name: Acolytes
description:
Lead A cult of Acolytes to slay the heroes and kill the king!

Controls:
Mouse: Lead acolytes with curser.
L.Click or Space: Spend souls to summon reinforcements




This game was made in one week for the bored pixel jam 8. I made all the assets during the jam with the exception of three of the background music tracks, which were made by me prior to the jam and the fonts are from 1001fonts.com
